verses.verse: The first <S%G3391><s%> day of the week <S%G4521><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene <S%G3094><s%> early, <S%G4404><s%> when it was yet <S%G2089><s%> dark, <S%G4653><s%> to the sepulcher, <S%G3419><s%> and sees <S%G991><s%> the stone <S%G3037><s%> taken <S%G142><s%> away from the sepulcher. <S%G3419><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> she runs, <S%G5143><s%> and comes <S%G2064><s%> to Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and to the other <S%G243><s%> disciple, <S%G3101><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> loved, <S%G5368><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, They have taken <S%G142><s%> away the LORD <S%G2962><s%> out of the sepulcher, <S%G3419><s%> and we know <S%G1492><s%> not where <S%G4226><s%> they have laid <S%G5087><s%> him.
Peter <S%G4074><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> forth, <S%G1831><s%> and that other <S%G243><s%> disciple, <S%G3101><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> to the sepulcher. <S%G3419><s%>

So <S%G1161><s%> they ran <S%G5143><s%> both <S%G1417><s%> together: <S%G3674><s%> and the other <S%G243><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> did outrun <S%G4370><s%> <S%G5032><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> to the sepulcher. <S%G3419><s%>
And he stooping <S%G3879><s%> down, <S%G3879><s%> and looking in, saw <S%G991><s%> the linen <S%G3608><s%> clothes <S%G3608><s%> lying; <S%G2749><s%> yet <S%G3305><s%> went <S%G1525><s%> he not in.

Then <S%G3767><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> following <S%G190><s%> him, and went <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sepulcher, <S%G3419><s%> and sees <S%G2334><s%> the linen <S%G3608><s%> clothes <S%G3608><s%> lie, <S%G2749><s%>

And the napkin, <S%G4676><s%> that was about <S%G1909><s%> his head, <S%G2776><s%> not lying <S%G2749><s%> with the linen <S%G3608><s%> clothes, <S%G3608><s%> but wrapped <S%G1794><s%> together <S%G1794><s%> in a place <S%G5117><s%> by itself. <S%G5565><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> went <S%G1525><s%> in also <S%G2532><s%> that other <S%G243><s%> disciple, <S%G3101><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> to the sepulcher, <S%G3419><s%> and he saw, <S%G1492><s%> and believed. <S%G4100><s%>
For as yet <S%G3764><s%> they knew <S%G1492><s%> not the scripture, <S%G1124><s%> that he must <S%G1163><s%> rise <S%G450><s%> again <S%G450><s%> from the dead. <S%G3498><s%>
Then <S%G3767><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to their own <S%G1438><s%> home. <S%G1438><s%>

But Mary <S%G3137><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> without <S%G1854><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the sepulcher <S%G3419><s%> weeping: <S%G2799><s%> and as she wept, <S%G2799><s%> she stooped <S%G3879><s%> down, <S%G3879><s%> and looked into <S%G1519><s%> the sepulcher, <S%G3419><s%>

And sees <S%G2334><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> in white <S%G3022><s%> sitting, <S%G2516><s%> the one <S%G1520><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the head, <S%G2776><s%> and the other <S%G1520><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the feet, <S%G4228><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had lain. <S%G2749><s%>

And they say <S%G3004><s%> to her, Woman, <S%G1135><s%> why weep <S%G2799><s%> you? She said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Because <S%G3754><s%> they have taken <S%G142><s%> away my LORD, <S%G2962><s%> and I know <S%G1492><s%> not where <S%G4226><s%> they have laid <S%G5087><s%> him.

And when she had thus <S%G5023><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> she turned <S%G4762><s%> herself back, <S%G3694><s%> and saw <S%G2334><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> standing, <S%G2476><s%> and knew <S%G1492><s%> not that it was Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, Woman, <S%G1135><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> weep <S%G2799><s%> you? whom <S%G5101><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> you? She, supposing <S%G1380><s%> him to be the gardener, <S%G2780><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Sir, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you have borne <S%G941><s%> him hence, tell <S%G2036><s%> me where <S%G4226><s%> you have laid <S%G5087><s%> him, and I will take <S%G142><s%> him away.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, Mary. <S%G3137><s%> She turned <S%G4762><s%> herself, and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Rabboni; <S%G4462><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is to say, <S%G3004><s%> Master. <S%G1320><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, Touch <S%G680><s%> me not; for I am not yet <S%G3768><s%> ascended <S%G305><s%> to my Father: <S%G3962><s%> but go <S%G4198><s%> to my brothers, <S%G80><s%> and say <S%G2036><s%> to them, I ascend <S%G305><s%> to my Father, <S%G3962><s%> and your <S%G5216><s%> Father; <S%G3962><s%> and to my God, <S%G2316><s%> and your <S%G5216><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene <S%G3094><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and told <S%G518><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> that she had seen <S%G3708><s%> the LORD, <S%G2962><s%> and that he had spoken <S%G2036><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things to her.

Then <S%G3767><s%> the same <S%G1565><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> at evening, <S%G3798><s%> being the first <S%G3391><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of the week, <S%G4521><s%> when the doors <S%G2374><s%> were shut <S%G2808><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> were assembled <S%G4863><s%> for fear <S%G5401><s%> of the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and stood <S%G2476><s%> in the middle, <S%G3319><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Peace <S%G1515><s%> be to you.

And when he had so <S%G5124><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> he showed <S%G1166><s%> to them his hands <S%G5495><s%> and his side. <S%G4125><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> were the disciples <S%G3101><s%> glad, <S%G5463><s%> when they saw <S%G1492><s%> the LORD. <S%G2962><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to them again, <S%G3825><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> be to you: as my Father <S%G3962><s%> has sent <S%G649><s%> me, even <S%G2504><s%> so send <S%G3992><s%> I you.

And when he had said <S%G2036><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> he breathed <S%G1720><s%> on <S%G1720><s%> them, and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Receive <S%G2983><s%> you the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost: <S%G4151><s%>

Whose <S%G5100><s%> soever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> you remit, <S%G863><s%> they are remitted <S%G863><s%> to them; and whose <S%G5100><s%> soever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> sins you retain, <S%G2902><s%> they are retained. <S%G2902><s%>
But Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the twelve, <S%G1427><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> Didymus, <S%G1324><s%> was not with them when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came. <S%G2064><s%>

The other <S%G243><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, We have seen <S%G3708><s%> the LORD. <S%G2962><s%> But he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Except <S%G3362><s%> I shall see <S%G1492><s%> in his hands <S%G5495><s%> the print <S%G5179><s%> of the nails, <S%G2247><s%> and put <S%G906><s%> my finger <S%G1147><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the print <S%G5179><s%> of the nails, <S%G2247><s%> and thrust <S%G906><s%> my hand <S%G5495><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his side, <S%G4125><s%> I will not believe. <S%G4100><s%>

And after <S%G3326><s%> eight <S%G3638><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> his disciples <S%G3101><s%> were within, <S%G2080><s%> and Thomas <S%G2381><s%> with them: then came <S%G2064><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> the doors <S%G2374><s%> being shut, <S%G2808><s%> and stood <S%G2476><s%> in the middle, <S%G3319><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> be to you.

Then <S%G1534><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> he to Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> Reach <S%G5342><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> your finger, <S%G1147><s%> and behold <S%G2396><s%> my hands; <S%G5495><s%> and reach <S%G5342><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> your hand, <S%G5495><s%> and thrust <S%G906><s%> it into <S%G1519><s%> my side: <S%G4125><s%> and be not faithless, <S%G571><s%> but believing. <S%G4103><s%>
And Thomas <S%G2381><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, My LORD <S%G2962><s%> and my God. <S%G2316><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you have seen <S%G3708><s%> me, you have believed: <S%G4100><s%> blessed <S%G3107><s%> are they that have not seen, <S%G1492><s%> and yet have believed. <S%G4100><s%>

And many <S%G4183><s%> other <S%G243><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> in the presence <S%G1799><s%> of his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> are not written <S%G1125><s%> in this <S%G5129><s%> book: <S%G975><s%>

But these <S%G5023><s%> are written, <S%G1125><s%> that you might believe <S%G4100><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> and that believing <S%G4100><s%> you might have <S%G2192><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> his name. <S%G3686><s%>
